title: rp cards
body: since when did they change it that u cant use rp cards from australia on na severs which is really annoying

replies.body: I did the same thing a few weeks ago, sent my mate $100 worth of RP for his birthday and he said he couldn't redeem it, lol.
well i wish they it made it clearer so that i wouldnt waste my money
Hey there! We disabled this functionality after Ocean week and messaged everyone who had bought retail RP in Aus and redeemed on the NA server. Do you know if your email address is up to date?
they changed it ages ago. like october or august or something.

Probably since they're changing the RP values.
The amount of RP you get with $5 AUD is different then with $5 USD.
You would be getting free RP if you bought $5AUD and claimed it as $5USD.
